name: WUHAN URBAN ENVIRONMENTAL IMPROVEMENT PROJECT
info: The proposed project is a key urban environmental initiative of Wuhan municipal government (WMG) with nationwide demonstration potential. The project will help WMG to (i) design and implement sustainable solutions for the management of wastewater treatment plant (WWTP) sludge, including its energy recovery and reuse of biosolids; (ii) improve water quality in urban lakes and water channels; (iii) reestablish water circulation and improve resilience to floods; (iv) improve the environment, living conditions, and public health standards; and (v) enhance public awareness of urban environmental and related public health issues.
